data.name: How to Sing to Open Your Heart - Theme Song
data.detailed_description:
Theme song of the game "How to Sing to Open Your Heart". All music files are available in MP3(320kbps) and FLAC (44.1kHz/16bit)

Additional Files

1. Lyrics (pdf)

2. Readme

Credit

"Kokouta"

Song: Yuki Yumeno
Lyric: Itsumo Nagahisa
Music: no.real
